PropertyFinder.Stats

Class AvgReviewsPerProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • PropertyFinder.AppPanel

                  • PropertyFinder.Stats.AvgReviewsPerProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AvgReviewsPerProperty
extends BarChart
    This class initialises and creates the dataset needed for a barchart in order to display the average reviews per property in all listings in the dataset
    Version:
    25.03.2018
    Author:
    Danilo Del Busso
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvgReviewsPerProperty

        public AvgReviewsPerProperty(java.lang.String title,
                             java.util.List<AirbnbListing> listings,
                             int lowPrice,
                             int highPrice)
        This Panel shows the average review score of available properties
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the panel to be displayed at the top
        listings - List of all results from the CSV file.
        lowPrice - Lower price boundary of the properties the user wants to see.
        highPrice - Upper price boundary of the properties the user wants to see.
